full_summary:
# Advertising Agency of Record Services
## Solicitation Number: WS4334360905

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites bids for Advertising Agency of Record Services.

### Notice Details

*   **Posting Date:** 2023-12-01
*   **Tender Closing Date:** 2024-01-25T14:00:00
*   **Amendment Date:** 2024-01-19
*   **Expected Contract Start Date:** 2024-04-01

### Notice Description

The Government of Canada seeks a contractor to provide Advertising Agency of Record services for a duration of three years, with an option to extend for up to four additional one-year periods. The successful contractor will be required to provide a wide range of advertising services, including multi-channel campaigns and smaller projects in targeted geographic locations.

### Eligibility and Bid Requirements

Please note that this Request for Proposal (RFP) includes criteria related to Indigenous suppliers and the use of Indigenous subcontractors. Bidders who believe these criteria cannot be met are invited to submit written comments.

### Additional Information

*   The contract will be awarded based on the Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price.
*   The Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) applies to this procurement.
*   The notice can be accessed on the Ariba platform: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18167536?extsite=MTgxNjc1MzZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18167536?extsite=MTgxNjc1MzZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
